page.description: Checks if a file exists in the file system of the mobile device.

argument.name: fileName
argument.description: The name of the file to look for.

argument.name: onResult
argument.description: A javascript function that is called when the method succeeds.

argument.name: onError
argument.description: A javascript function that is called if an error occurs when trying to find the file.

page.discussion: The phoneGapFileExists method checks if a file exists in the file system of the mobile device. The method is asynchronous. Calls the onResult function if the method succeeded. Calls the onError function is the method failed.
